title: maaya manusha
sahitya:
mAyA mAnuSa harE mAmava sadA shaurE mAdhava madanAbhirAma krSNa murArE

anupallavi

 shrI yAdavAnvayEndra karuNA pIyUSa sAndra shRidEvi citOhara kamanIyAnana sAndra

caraNam

 kuru shubham hrSIkEsha guruvAyupurAdhIsha suravairi gaNa nAsha sUryakOTi prakAsha 
nirupama guNAlaya nikhilAmaya vilaya nirmala vana tulasIdAma bhUSitakAya
